item.description:

item.title: Mentioned by West Island Chronicle
item.description:
Morin back to work after illness
NDG-Lachine riding (which includes Dorval) Member of Parliament Isabelle Morin is back to work today after a bout with Bell's Palsy, which required her to rest for several weeks. The disease causes partial paralysis of the facial muscles and requires at least a ...

item.title: Mentioned by West Island Gazette
item.description:
Federal MP back on the job after bout with Bell's Palsy
Federal New Democrat MP Isabelle Morin (Notre-Dame-de-Grâce-Lachine) returned to work this week, six weeks after doctors ordered her to take a temporary leave of absence from her duties. The 27-year-old Morin was diagnosed with Bell's Palsy in early ...
